message:
‎"... the idea that our movements on the Web are even remotely private or untraceable is false. The central 'authorities' who control the gears of the machine know exactly where you have been, while Google & the CIA have even developed ways of knowing where you’re going next as well. It’s very creepy to know that our every move is being tracked, traced & databased..."

http://dprogram.net/2011/02/23/6-threats-to-free-and-open-access-to-the-internet/
